#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long t,x;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&x);
		if(x%4==0)
		{
			printf("%lld\n",x);
		}
		else if((x%2==0)&&(x%4!=0))
			printf("%lld\n",x+1);
		else if((x%4==3))
			printf("0\n");
		else
			printf("1\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
